==Dutch== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nl|/bəˈstɛlə(n)/}} * {{audio|nl|Nl-bestellen.ogg|audio}} * {{hyphenation|nl|be|stel|len}} * {{rhymes|nl|ɛlən}} ===Etymology 1=== From {{inh|nl|dum|bestellen}}. Equivalent to {{prefix|nl|be|stellen}}. ====Verb==== {{nl-verb}} # {{lb|nl|transitive}} to [[order]], [[demand]] delivery #: {{ux|nl|Wil je koffie? Ik zal ons wat '''bestellen'''!|Do you want coffee? I will '''order''' us some!}} # {{lb|nl|transitive}} to [[deliver]] #: {{ux|nl|Die bakkerij '''bestelt''' nog aan huis.|That bakery still '''delivers''' at home.}} =====Inflection===== {{nl-conj-wk|pref=be|stel|stelle}} =====Derived terms===== * {{l|nl|besteller}} * {{l|nl|bestelling}} * {{l|nl|bestelbus}} * {{l|nl|bestelformulier}} * {{l|nl|bestelwagen}} ===Etymology 2=== {{nonlemma}} ====Noun==== {{head|nl|noun plural form}} # {{nl-noun form of|pl|bestel}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|be|stellen}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/bəˈʃtɛlən/|[bəˈʃtɛlən]|[-ˈʃtɛl̩n]}} * {{audio|de|De-bestellen.ogg|audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|be|stel|len}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|bestellt|bestellte|bestellt}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} To [[order]] to come, to [[summon]] # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} To demand [[delivery]], to [[order]] (e.g. food) # {{lb|de|transitive|or|intransitive}} To [[reserve]] (e.g. a table, hotel room) # {{lb|de|transitive}} To [[convey]] (a message, greetings) # {{lb|de|transitive}} To [[cultivate]], [[till]] ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|bestell|bestellt|h}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|abbestellen}} * {{l|de|Besteller|g=m}} * {{l|de|Bestellung}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|anstellen}} * {{l|de|einstellen}} * {{l|de|zustellen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|lb|goh|bistellen}}; equivalent to {{prefix|lb|be|stellen}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/beˈʃtælen/|[bəˈʃtælən]}} ===Verb=== {{lb-verb||bestallt}} # to [[order]] ====Conjugation==== {{lb-conj-regular|bestell|bestallt|hunn}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|lb|Bestellung}}
